headerDisplay: Control your Klereo swimming pool system through HomeKit. Visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/lachlanlaycock/homebridge-klereo-connect) for more information.
footerDisplay: For help and support, please visit the [issues page](https://github.com/lachlanlaycock/homebridge-klereo-connect/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that will appear in your Homebridge log.

username.title: Klereo Username
username.description: Your Klereo Connect account username or email address.

password.title: Klereo Password
password.description: Your Klereo Connect account password. This will be securely hashed before being sent to the API.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check for status updates from the pool system (in milliseconds). Default is 30000 (30 seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but increase API load.

items.description: Adjust how frequently the plugin checks for updates. Lower values mean faster response to manual changes but more API calls.
